name: Piconian
description:
Piconian

My first real Pico-8 game, Piconian is here! Dodge space debris and enemy bullets as you try to destroy the enemy bases and save the universe!

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Change ship direction
  • X - Fire bullets
  • Z - Pause game
    • In the pause menu, you can change the appearance of the minimap!
Objectives

Destroy all of the enemy bases! With each level completed, the number of enemy ships will slowly increase! Gain extra lives every time you earn 1000 points.
